title: Wrongfully banned for MMR boosting?
body:
Hello? I received an email saying that I am MMR boosting and I get a 2 week suspension. No one but me has played on this account. And I have been playing solo queue games every single day for the last 2 weeks. No one but me plays on this account. I am extremely upset and disappointed in riot. In no way or form have I elo boosted or mmr boosted. I've risen to Gold 1 and then got demoted and then had a short win streak. IN ANY CASE IM THE ONLY ONE PLAYING. I really don't understand. I've spent so much money on this game and I'm going to give up on this game and this company.

ign: KR Dopa
user: deoxidize27

replies.body:
Hey everyone,

The emails are not false and suspensions will follow. If you feel that this is an incorrect suspension, feel free to create a ticket to support and we can work with you there.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

@KR Dopa

I decided to look into your account and double check this case. While you are correct that YOU never engaged in boosting, the account did. This account was a botted account, that got boosted and placed into Gold, which was then purchased by you. Due to this breach, I have went forward with permanently suspending  your account.

Could you kindly look into my account? I have not ELO boosted. I have played from my work computer a few times but sheesh. I just recently won a few normals in preseason, i am not sure what prompted this. I was hoping to practice with my friends tonight.
Please look into mine as well, I have not done any elo boosting and I did not purchase this account.
Could you please look into mine please am I allowed to give my ticket number here? I did not buy my account I have access to current and all previous emails. I had never EVER boosted.
#REKT

This is my alt account and I`m owner of 2 diamond accounts, this is my fun 1 that I use to play with friends I bring it to EUNE from WEST somewhere in spring. It is true that I played these ranked games on my father`s computer because is better have better ping better hardware everything and I had IP adress that is different then it is when I play normal games with my friends. I GOT BANNED CAUSE I PLAYED PLACEMENT MATCHES ON DIFFERENT COMPUTER. Riot if this is your way off banning boosters Im really sorry for your players base. I was writting to support and got some **** answer. Im planning to stop playing LoL and I am willing to give my 2 diamonds account to Bronze 5 players so they could destroy life of other Diamond players because of your ignorance... GL HF RIOT
Same here banned for getting out of hell silver elo and becoming gold2. GJ Rito. Your system is old and useless. Banning people for fun.  You think its a joke or what ?

This same thing happened to me, I recently made a trip to the EU to visit friends and go to a few events, and logged in over there on a couple of the PC's at the events, but I've never boosted my account, so I was curious as to why I was banned for this.  I mean I get that the IP's were different which could look strange, but I can confirm every login on my account ever made (I make logs of it, cause I also record my stats) yet I still received a 2 week ban.  Honestly it's not the end of the world, but being accused of something I didn't do is not cool.

No longer wanted to share my story so just edited the post. Players are already wasting lives to adapt to the huge gap between patches and the shitty balance of the game. Let's see how many people would leave this game forever because of this suspension. Wish you make better games and have more players as you wish Rito. GL & HF.

Heya **KR Dopa**,

As this is an account-specific inquiry, we can't assist you much further on the boards. You'll need to [submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) regarding your issue. A few tips as you submit your request: 

1. Be sure to submit as much information in your initial ticket as possible. For obvious reasons, each Rioter request for more information will delay the resolution of the issue. 
2. Create an account on the Riot Games Support website. It'll save you a lot of time in the future and keep your requests organized and easier to find/access. 
3. Be respectful and polite in your correspondences with Riot Support. 

Best of luck!
